name: accounts
description: Accounts of platforms users can sign up with. Bindle users might have Facebook or Email accounts.

columns.name: platform
columns.description: Account’s platform. Bindle allows email and facebook signups.

columns.name: email
columns.description: Email attached to the account. Note that different platforms could have different emails.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when this account was created. created_at of the first account is user’s signup timestamp.
